revision.text:
{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = D-Link DSR-150.jpg |image1_size = 150px |caption = 8-Port Fast Ethernet Wireless VPN Router |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = http://us.dlink.com/products/business-solutions/dsr-150/ |sp = https://support.dlink.com/ProductInfo.aspx?m=DSR-150 |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = D-Link_DSR-150_A2 |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = D-Link |model = DSR-150 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = A2 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |series = DSR |type = VPN Router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Cavium;CNS3411; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = ARM11MPCore |cpu1spd = 600 <!-- 300 / 500 / 700 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Macronix;MX29GL256EHT2I-90Q; |flash1size = 32 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 128 |ram1chip = Samsung;K4T1G164QF-BCE7; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = IC+;IP101A; |sw1chip = IC+;IP178C; |wan_ports = <!-- 1 --> |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 8 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 6C:19:8F, C0:A0:BB, C4:12:F5,
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;2010.08-mpcore-svn606;; |stockos = Linux;2.6.31.1-cavm1;;
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, |exp_usb_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 1.5 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 2.1 |pwr_barrel_len = 9.5 |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, RJ45 console,, (115200 8N1), |jtag = yes,, 20-pin header,, unpopulated,, JP1
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = <!-- flags, Leave blank for none --> |addchip = 2 Channel RS232 Interface;Analog Devices;ADM3202;;1;,,, Low drop positive voltage regulator;STMicroelectronics;LD1117;;1;,,, 2A, 18V Synchronous Rectified Step-Down Converter;MPS;MP1482DS;;2;,,, 3A, 23V, 340kHz Synchronous Step-Down Converter;Richtek;RT8290;;1;,,, 3-state Octal buffer/line driver;NXP;74LVCH244A;;1;,,, |802dot11_protocols = none
|defaulip = 192.168.10.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = admin |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = 9SIA6ZP3KN9903 |asin = B008ZXBP58 |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== 'This device appears to be the [[D-Link DSR-150N A2]] without WiFi related chips. ''DSR-150N REV.A2'' and ''2340DSR150N*17A2'' are silkscreened on the board.
==Links of Interest== *[ftp://ftp2.dlink.com/PRODUCTS/DSR-150/REVA/DSR-150_REVA_QIG_v2.00_NA_EN_FR.pdf Quick Install Guide] *[ftp://ftp2.dlink.com/PRODUCTS/DSR-SERIES/DSR-SERIES_MANUAL_v3.13_WW.pdf User Manual] *[https://dlink-gpl.s3.amazonaws.com/GPL1400149/D-Link_DSR-150N_GPL-SRC_v1.09B32.tar.bz2 GPL Firmware Source]
[[Category:English Documentation]]
